    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Conducting materials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitmaterialien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériaux de conduite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Materiais conduzindo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiali di condotta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεύθυνση των υλικών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Materiales que conducen</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First in a series of three diagrams which demonstrate the steps in an experiment to determine whether a material is conducting or insulating. This diagram shows a sample material held in alligator clips.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alligator clips</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conducting materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conductivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Conductors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crocodile clips</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insulating materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Insulators</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Testing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst in einer Reihe von drei Diagrammen, die die
Jobsteps in einem Experiment zeigen, um festzustellen, ob ein Material
leitet oder isoliert. Dieses Diagramm zeigt ein 
Beispielmaterial, das in den Quetschklammern angehalten wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord dans une série de trois diagrammes qui 
démontrent les étapes dans une expérience pour déterminer si un 
matériel conduit ou isole. Ce diagramme montre un matériel 
témoin tenu dans des pinces crododile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente em uma série de três diagramas que
demonstram as etapas em uma experiência para determinar se um 
material está conduzindo ou está isolando. Este diagrama 
mostra um material da amostra prendido em grampos de jacaré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Primo di una serie di tre schemi che dimostrano i 
punti in un esperimento per determinare se un materiale stia 
conducendo o isolando. Questo schema mostra un materiale del 
campione tenuto in clip di coccodrillo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα σε μία σειρά τριών διαγραμμάτων που 
καταδεικνύουν τα βήματα σε ένα πείραμα για να καθορίσουν εάν 
ένα υλικό διευθύνει ή μονώνει. Αυτό το διάγραμμα 
εμφανίζει υλικό δειγμάτων που κρατιέται στους σαν αλλιγάτορας 
συνδετήρες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero en una serie de tres diagramas que 
demuestran los pasos de progresión en un experimento para 
determinarse si un material está conduciendo o está aislando. 
Este diagrama muestra un material de la muestra llevado a cabo 
en clips de cocodrilo.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
